Examples and Tutorials 
==========================

Jupyter Notebooks 
------------------

We have provided a few Jupyter notebookes to show case the functionalities of the one-pass package. Note that notebook XX shows the opa with the streaming simulator developed by `AQUA <https://github.com/oloapinivad/AQUA/tree/main>`__. In order to use this notebook you have installed the AQUA (WP7) repo.
